other_title: 綾音ちゃんハイキック (Japanese)
plot: Ayane is a high school student focused on one thing, becoming a pro wrestler. A trainer tricks her into becoming a Kick Boxer, the sport she hates. She keeps with it though once she finds out.
opening_theme: "Fight For Yourself" by The Street Beats
ending_theme: "Aoi kaze no mukou ni" by Masako Miyamura
